name: Avatar of Death
languages: all languages known to its summoner
conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, unconscious

trait.name: Hit Points
text: half the hit point maximum of its summoner

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
text: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
text: The avatar is immune to features that turn undead.

action.name: Reaping Scythe
action.text: The avatar sweeps its spectral scythe through a creature within 5 feet of it, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

description:
Summoned by the "Skull" card from the Deck of Many Things.
Source: Dungeon Master's Guide p. 164, Tasha's Cauldron of Everything
